00085     public Route() 
00086     {
00087         nInstances++;
00088         id = nInstances;
00089         costs = 0;
00090         demand = 0;
00091         edges = new ArrayList<Edge>();
00092         nodes = new ArrayList<Node>();
00093         xRouteCenter = (float) 0.0;
00094         yRouteCenter = (float) 0.0;
00095     }
00096     
00102     public Route(Route referenceRoute) 
00103     {
00104         nInstances = referenceRoute.nInstances;
00105         id = referenceRoute.id;
00106         costs = referenceRoute.costs;
00107         demand = referenceRoute.demand;
00108         edges = referenceRoute.edges;
00109         nodes = referenceRoute.nodes;
00110         xRouteCenter = referenceRoute.xRouteCenter;
00111         yRouteCenter = referenceRoute.yRouteCenter;
00112     }
00113 
00119     public void addEdge(Edge anEdge) 
00120     {
00121         edges.add(anEdge);
00122 
00123         if (nodes.contains(anEdge.getOrigin()) == false) 
00124         {
00125             nodes.add(anEdge.getOrigin());
00126         }
00127 
00128         if (nodes.contains(anEdge.getEnd()) == false) 
00129         {
00130             nodes.add(anEdge.getEnd());
00131         }
00132     }
00133     
00137     public void resetEdges()
00138     {
00139         edges.clear();
00140         nodes.clear();
00141     }
00142     
00150     public void setEdges(ArrayList<Edge> newEdges, ArrayList<Node> newNodes)
00151     {
00152         edges = newEdges;
00153         nodes = newNodes;
00154     }
00155 
00161     public void removeEdge(Edge anEdge) 
00162     {
00163         edges.remove(anEdge);
00164     }
00165 
00171     public void addCosts(Edge anEdge) 
00172     {
00173         costs += anEdge.getCosts();
00174     }
00175 
00181     public void substractCosts(Edge anEdge) 
00182     {
00183         costs -= anEdge.getCosts();
00184     }

00221     public void addDemand(Edge anEdge) 
00222     {

00225     }

00324     public String toString() {
00325         String s = "";
00326         s = s.concat("\nRuta Id: " + this.getId());
00327         s = s.concat("\nRute costs: " + (this.getCosts()));
